meanings.definition: A person in charge of a worker or organization.
meanings.sent1: The boss told us to work hard today.
meanings.sent2: My boss is always busy with meetings.
meanings.sent3: The boss joked about joining us for lunch.
meanings.sent4: She runs the company like a boss.
meanings.sent5: The boss's office is on the top floor.

meanings.sent1: That was a boss movie we watched last night.
meanings.sent2: She did a boss job on her presentation.
meanings.sent3: The cake was boss, everyone loved it.
meanings.sent4: His skills are boss, he always impresses.
meanings.sent5: The sunset was boss, with vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: I will boss you around if you don't listen.
meanings.sent2: She likes to boss her siblings during playtime.
meanings.sent3: Don't boss me around, I know what to do.
meanings.sent4: He tends to boss everyone in group projects.
meanings.sent5: The coach will boss the team during practice.
